name: SOULCALIBUR VI - DLC1: Tira
detailed_description:
Access to the playable character Tira in the full retail version of SOULCALIBUR VI.

The pack also includes a unique story for Tira in the Soul Chronicle mode.

This content can also be accessed with the SOULCALIBUR VI season pass (sold separately). Be sure to check that you have not purchased the same content twice.

You must have the full retail version of the game to use this content. Additionally, you must be playing on the latest version of the game to access the content.

short_description: Access to the playable character Tira in the full retail version of SOULCALIBUR VI. The pack also includes a unique story for Tira in the Soul Chronicle mode.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Процессор: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz or equivalent
  • Оперативная память: 6 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Место на диске: 20 GB
  • Звуковая карта: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Процессор: Intel Core i5-4690 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Место на диске: 20 GB
  • Звуковая карта: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
